def_cn: （英国的）基层法院法官，治安法官（缩略形式为JP）
def_en: In Britain, a Justice of the Peace is a person who is not a lawyer but who can act as a judge in a local criminal law court. The abbreviation JP is also used.

def_cn: （美国一些州的）地方官（处理小案件或证婚等法律事务，缩略形式为JP）
def_en: In some states in the United States, a Justice of the Peace is an official who can carry out some legal tasks, such as settling minor cases in court or performing marriages. The abbreviation JP is also used.
